channel.title: Posts on Peter Xia
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Peter Xia

item.title: readme
item.description: Github Pages supporting HTTPS certificates this year prompts me to get this personal blog ready (barely) after owning the domain for over 4 years. This site is statically generated with hugo, using the default anake theme. The theme hasn’t been modified at all because I’m bad at doing webpage layout. I believe a blog is about its content and the styling doesn’t matter. However, I would tweak the style a little bit until the website does not look too low-effort.
